messages.subject: Some OT actor stories
messages.msgSnippet: My Paul Mercurio story is entirely in the realm of gossip. I worked in the Wardrobe of La Cage Aux Folles when it came to Australia from Broadway, in 1984.
messages.messageBody:
"My Paul Mercurio story is entirely in the realm of gossip. I worked
in the
Wardrobe of "La Cage Aux Folles" when it came to Australia from
Broadway, in
1984."

What a fun splay to be involved with! Cool.

Every time I see you and James, we're so focused on unschooling/kids,
I never get to ask you about behind the scenes stories. I bet between
the two of you, there's quite a few interesting stories...even without
the theatre/actor connections.;)

I really wish you lived closer Robyn..I need to pick that costume
design brain of yours. Sierra ADORES altering clothing and coming up
with costume ideas.

Ren
